abstract: Profile of Lloyd Ultan, Bronx borough historian who has made career out of documenting borough's often overlooked past; has written book along with Shelley Olson titled The Bronx: The Ultimate Guide to New York City's Beautiful Burough.
lead_paragraph: Sharing his love and knowledge of the Bronx, Mr. Ultan, the borough historian, points out major tourist attractions and lesser-known gems in his latest book about his home.

headline.main: Touring the Bronx With Lloyd Ultan, a Borough Institution
headline.print_headline: Equal Parts Cheerleader and Historian for Borough That’s Often Overlooked
